name: jwtAuthorizr
description: Custom Authorizer Lambda function for API Gateway with Bearer JWT

scripts.cfn:create: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name jwtAuthorizr --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --template-body file://./resources.cfn.yml
scripts.cfn:update: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name jwtAuthorizr --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --template-body file://./resources.cfn.yml
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run upload && npm run update
